channel.title: Ubuntu help please
channel.description:
ok, I'm sure like 80% or more of this community is for ubuntu, so can some one help me? i tried posting on the ubuntu forums but my shit gets pushed off the first page before any progress is made.
I tried getting on one day and it would not load the gui, i tried that one command to configure hte x server or what ever, selected vesa cause i have no clue what video driver my pc has, and now not only does the gui not load up, it says there is an error in the x server. ive selected vesa before and it worked, I am at a loss.
My pc is a Dell Inspiron b130, i tried renaming the old xorg.conf file and then renaming a backup to xorg.conf, but it would not let me. Any help is greatly appreciated.

What is the xserver error?
